data.raw:
Animation

Smooth animation using a cubic-bezier transition.
It is used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element.
The animation style follows the [Google Web Fundamentals](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/look-and-feel/animations/animating-between-views) best practices.

Styleguide animation
data.description: Smooth animation using a cubic-bezier transition. It is used for all animations like the slider or hovering an element. The animation style follows the Google Web Fundamentals best practices.

data.raw:
Colors

The colors together with the color pairs.
Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white.
All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using [Lea Verou's excellent tool](http://leaverou.github.io/contrast-ratio/)

Styleguide colors
data.description: The colors together with the color pairs. Colors don't exist alone yet in pairs, like black on white. All color pairs have a contrast ratio set for perfect readability using Lea Verou's excellent tool

data.raw:
Link

Link styling. No underlines just differentiation by color.

Styleguide link
data.description: Link styling. No underlines just differentiation by color.

data.raw:
Long-dash

A slighly wider dash used instead of —. This is one of the stylemarks of this site's design.

Styleguide long-dash
data.description: A slighly wider dash used instead of —. This is one of the stylemarks of this site's design.

data.raw:
Unordered list without decoration

Unordered lists with no bullets nor `long-dash` decorators.

Styleguide no-dash
data.description: Unordered lists with no bullets nor long-dash decorators.

data.raw:
Paragraph

Paragraphs.
Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability for long text.

Styleguide p
data.description: Paragraphs. Consecutive paragraphs are separated by an empty line for better readability for long text.

data.raw:
UL

Unordered lists.
Instead of bullets they use the `long-dash` decorator.

Styleguide ul
data.description: Unordered lists. Instead of bullets they use the long-dash decorator.

data.raw:
Uppercase

Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.

Styleguide uppercase
data.description: Uppercase text. Letters inside an uppercase text have larger letter spacing for better readability.
